description: Steve Cruz is burning up with desire. Among the dirt and mess of hisapartment Steve is jerking off to the image of a man he has beenstalking. As he eagerly masturbates, Steve's TV screen is filled by thebeauty of his crush, Damien Crosse (non-sexual role). A few days later at the gym Steve is drying offwhen Damien walks in and accosts him...Damien knows Steve's beenspying on him and violently warns Steve to leave him alone...beforeslamming him into the lockers. title: Hotter Than Hell Part 1, Scene #01
